verses.verse: <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> high <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G2983>taken<s%> from <S%G1537>among<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> is <S%G2525>ordained<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> in things pertaining <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> he may <S%G4374>offer<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G1435>gifts<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifices<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%>:

Who <S%G1410>can<s%> have <S%G3356>compassion<s%> on the <S%G50>ignorant<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> on them that are out of the <S%G4105>way<s%>; <S%G1893>for<s%> that <S%G4029>he<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> is <S%G4029>compassed<s%> with <S%G769>infirmity<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G2983>taketh<s%> this <S%G5092>honour<s%> unto <S%G1438>himself<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> he that is <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2509%G2532>as<s%> was <S%G2>Aaron<s%>.

<S%G2539>Though<s%> he <S%G5607>were<s%> a <S%G5207>Son<s%>, yet learned <S%G3129>he<s%> <S%G5218>obedience<s%> <S%G575>by<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G3958>suffered<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> being made <S%G5048>perfect<s%>, he <S%G1096>became<s%> the <S%G159>author<s%> of <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> unto <S%G3956>all<s%> them that <S%G5219>obey<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>;

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4731>strong<s%> <S%G5160>meat<s%> belongeth to them that <S%G2076>are<s%> of full <S%G5046>age<s%>, even those who by <S%G1223>reason<s%> of <S%G1838>use<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> their <S%G145>senses<s%> <S%G1128>exercised<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G1253>discern<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%>.
